fields.title: Monopoly
fields.description: A classic board game where players buy properties, build houses, and collect rent.

fields.title: Settlers of Catan
fields.description: Players try to be the first to reach a predetermined number of points by trading resources, building settlements, and developing infrastructure.

fields.title: Ticket to Ride
fields.description: Players try to claim railway routes across Europe by collecting cards of various types of train cars and then drawing tickets to claim railway routes.

fields.title: Carcassonne
fields.description: In this tile-laying game, players take turns drawing tiles and placing them on the map, attempting to have the majority of features in the area around their cities.

fields.title: Pandemic
fields.description: Players work together to treat diseases and cure them before they spread out of control. Requires cooperation between all players to win.
